entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:14 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 04:40 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NNE 31 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
